summary: This is an email chain from June 23, 2020, discussing the preparation of talking points about Ghislaine Maxwell for a briefing with the Attorney General. It indicates coordination on the Maxwell case and mentions concerns about timing and readiness.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses preparing talking points about Maxwell for a briefing with the Attorney General, indicating she is a high-profile upcoming case.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The sender asks the recipient to take a glance at the 'Prince Andrew stuff in particular' regarding the talking points.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced in the filename of the attached talking points document ('Jeffrey_Epstein_Co-Conspirators_Talking_Points').

connections.description: The attached document filename references 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Co-Conspirators_Talking_Points', directly linking Maxwell to Epstein as a co-conspirator.
The email specifically requests a review of 'the Prince Andrew stuff' within the talking points, indicating an association relevant to the case.

events.title: Email coordination on Maxwell talking points
events.description: Prosecutors exchange emails to edit and finalize talking points about Ghislaine Maxwell for an upcoming briefing with the Attorney General.

events.title: Planned AG briefing on high-profile cases
events.description: The Attorney General is scheduled to be briefed on upcoming high-profile cases, including the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Prosecutors were preparing talking points for the Attorney General regarding the high-profile case against Ghislaine Maxwell as of June 23, 2020.
The attached document was titled 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Co-Conspirators_Talking_Points', explicitly labeling Maxwell as a co-conspirator of Jeffrey Epstein.
The email indicates internal coordination and concern about the readiness and timing for moving forward with the Maxwell case.
Prince Andrew is mentioned as a specific topic within the talking points that required review.
